segments.text: I can't wait to go skiing tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . It's going to be so much fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I always get excited the day before .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I used to be like that . But I go skiing so often that I don't get excited anymore .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I only go skiing twice a year , so it's a real treat for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whenever I go to Vegas , I get really excited .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ... that makes me excited too !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Looks like anything fun makes you excited .
segments.speaker: S2
